sources.title: Blind Husbands (1919)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. The first film directed by Erich von Stroheim, Blind Husbands was a massive critical and commercial hit, providing clout for his films for many years. In it, an Austrian soldier attempts to seduce an attention-deprived wife while distracting her husband with other affairs. I have uploaded the German-intertitled film, as this version has extra footage that the US version does not. I have also included an English subtitle track to the file.

sources.title: Blind Husbands (1919) Von Stroheim- Drama, Romance Silent Film
sources.description:
An Austrian officer sets out to seduce a neglected young wife.

Director: Erich von Stroheim 
Writers: Erich von Stroheim
Stars: Sam De Grasse, Francelia Billington, Erich von Stroheim 
Genre:  Classics, Cult Film, Drama, Romance, Silent
Budget:$42,000

metadata.Plot: An Austrian military officer and roue' attempts to seduce the wife of a surgeon. The two men confront each other in a test of abilities that ends surprisingly.
metadata.Actors: Sam De Grasse, Francelia Billington, Erich von Stroheim
